name: Dog Jam
description:
Dog Jam is a card game that simulates Game Jam's 48-hour game development. Play as Corgi Bacon and participates in the Game Jam 48-hour Extreme Game Development Competition.
Players need to build their own decks, to face each Game Jam's unique themes. Deploy and complete Conceptions to get better results, and more experience to get more cards. Qualified for the annual Dog Jam Invitational Tournament by achieving excellent results in the first seven Game Jams.
In the game, the Conceptions are all played by the players themselves. Each Conception has different characteristics. Implement as many Conceptions as possible to make your work better, but the Conceptions that is not Implemented in time will be become a vulnerability that affects the final grade. The special effects of the theme will affect the game's ideas, and the theme is announced after the deck is built, ability to cope is more important.
Outside the Jams, you need to manage your schedule, appoint friends with different abilities to team up, and to improve your ability to get more cards.


· More than 40 different themes
· A total of more than 100 Conception and Design cards
· 30 friends with unique ability
